name: Pushbullet Notifications for WordPress
author: Francis Noel

sections.description:
Using the Pushbullet Notifications application on your Android device in conjunction with your WordPress blog and this plugin, you can be notified of events happening on your blog as Push Notifications on your mobile device.

Currently supports notifications for new users, comments, pingback/trackbacks, user specific password reset notifications, plugin and theme upgrades, core upgrades.
sections.installation:
You can install this plugin directly from your WordPress dashboard:

  1. Go to the Plugins menu and click Add New.
  2. Search for Pushbullet notifications.
  3. Click Install Now next to the Pushbullet notifications plugin.
  4. Activate the plugin.

Alternatively, see the guide to Manually Installing Plugins.

Usage

  1. Go to the Settings -> Pushbullet Notifications.
sections.faq:
Where download pushbullet android version ?

From play store : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pushbullet.android

Where find more information on pushbullet ?

Official pushbullet site : https://www.pushbullet.com/

short_description: Pushbullet Notifications allows your WordPress site to send push notifications straight to your Android and iOS device.
description:
Using the Pushbullet Notifications application on your Android device in conjunction with your WordPress blog and this plugin, you can be notified of events happening on your blog as Push Notifications on your mobile device.

Currently supports notifications for new users, comments, pingback/trackbacks, user specific password reset notifications, plugin and theme upgrades, core upgrades.

upgrade_notice.1.3.5: Goto settings > Pushbullet Notifications to set device iden
upgrade_notice.1.2.0: Custom type support. Goto setting for setup.
